attributes.action: Charge for a TV Licence only for those who wish to receive BBC channels. (Unscrambled)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Charge for a TV Licence only for those who wish to receive BBC channels.
Now that we are going digital the BBC can scramble their channels then we would have the choice - those who wish to watch BBC can pay for a TV licence and then receive unscrambled BBC. THe rest of us can watch the the other channels with out a BBC TV licence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
